import React from 'react' import { Button, Container, Form, FormGroup, FormLabel } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async' function SignInScreen() { const { search } = useLocation() const redirectInURL = new URLSearchParams(search).get('redirect') const redirect = redirectInURL ? redirectInURL : '/' return ( Sign In
